name: Ganondorf
description: The King of Darkness himself. His power corrupts all of Hyrule.

name: Dark Link
description: Link's dark reflection, born from shadow and malice.

name: Lynel
description: Centaur-like beasts with incredible strength and magical prowess.

name: King Dodongo
description: A massive dinosaur-like creature that breathes fire and swallows bombs.

name: Poe
description: Ghostly spirits that carry lanterns and hunt in the darkness.

name: Skulltula
description: Giant spiders that lurk in dark corners and abandoned places.

name: Bokoblin
description: Pig-faced creatures that serve Ganon with crude weapons.

name: Keese
description: Demonic bats that swarm in caves and attack in groups.

name: Moblin
description: Massive pig-like creatures with clubs and spears.

name: Redead
description: Zombie-like creatures that paralyze victims with their screams.

name: Gibdo
description: Mummified undead that shamble through ancient ruins.

name: Phantom Ganon
description: A ghostly projection of Ganondorf's power and malice.
